LanguageData.Mending_progressiveMending_Tooltip:
The level of repairing an item depends on the skill of the pawn responsible for performing the repair (by default, Crafting). 

Each new pawn skill level increases the repair limit by 5%. 100% repair corresponds to level 20 pawn skill. 

The amount of the bonus is added to the pawn's skill level, but the resulting repair level cannot exceed 100%.
LanguageData.Mending_pawnFreeSkillBonus_ToolTip: The number of bonus points for the pawn repair skill. Allows you to reach the maximum repair level earlier.
LanguageData.Mending_decreaseQualityOnFail: Reduce the quality of an item on error
LanguageData.Mending_decreaseQualityOnFail_Tooltip: Failure during Mending cause decreasing the quality of the item by 1 step.
LanguageData.Mending_allowToRemoveDebuff_Tooltip: Removes "worn by a corpse" debuff from clothing upon completion of repair
